item.description: A carver is when I lead with the help of a live map, in this case a mounted iPad. This allows for un interrupted travel via back roads to a destination or between waypoints on our tour. These rides often offer great photo opportunities and memorable people we meet on the way. Weather is expected to be in the mid 60' and partly cloudy. We will head west on the pike for about 45 min, then south and further west in search of breakfast. Carving focus will be northwest Connecticut. See you Saturday at the Hess at 9 or at westborough plaza on the pike at 10
item.name: Fall carver III
